data.name: Soul Orbs
data.tooltip:
Manifest <d ref="duckiesHeroPandoraMultishot_StartPersistent.periodic.count"/> soul orbs to strike randomly chosen enemies in the target area. Each orb inflicts <d ref="duckiesHeroPandoraMultishot_Damage.amount" style="Bold"/> damage, heals caster for damage dealt and stuns it's target for <d ref="duckiesHeroPandoraMultishot_Stunned.duration"/> seconds.

Soul Orbs will attempt to hit different targets if they're able to.
